name: Muzamil-MD
description: WhatsApp Auto Forward Bot with Multi-Device Support

SESSION_ID.description: Unique session ID for your bot

MONGODB_URL.description: MongoDB connection URL for storing session data

SOURCE_JIDS.description: Comma-separated list of JIDs to forward messages FROM

TARGET_JIDS.description: Comma-separated list of JIDs to forward messages TO

OLD_TEXT_REGEX.description: Comma-separated regex patterns to replace in captions

NEW_TEXT.description: Text to replace OLD_TEXT_REGEX matches with
